item.title: Have TwitterServer Will Test
item.description: Did you know you can use Finatra’s Feature Tests utilities for testing any TwitterServer? That is, you can start a locally running server and write tests which issue requests to it as long the server extends from c.t.server.TwitterServer. It doesn’t specifically have to be a Finatra server. Recent changes to Finatra testing utilities allow for any arbitrary TwitterServer to be able to create Feature Tests and a very useful type of Feature Test is a simple Startup Test where you can verify your server starts and is configured how you would expect.
